item.title: 日元反弹促使日本股市解除套期保值，但投资者对盈利打击保持警惕
item.description: 日元的反弹刺激了全球投资者对汇率套期保值的回撤，他们不再预期日币会迅速下跌。【原文：The yen’s rebound has spurred a roll-back of exchange-rate hedges by global investors who are no longer anticipating a rapid slide in the Japanese currency.】

item.title: 美联储会议前市场等待通胀数据，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 黄金保持小幅上涨，市场期待本周的美国通胀数据为美联储下周会议的降息预期规模提供线索。【原文：Gold held a small advance, with markets looking ahead to this week’s US inflation data for clues on the size of the Federal Reserve’s expected rate cut at its meeting next week.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市上涨，债券小幅波动。苹果公司推出新款 iPhone。汇丰银行考虑合并两个部门。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks rise as bonds see small moves. Apple introduces its new iPhone. HSBC weighs merging two divisions. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 交易商追随风险偏好基调和弗朗辛风暴，石油价格趋于平稳
item.description: 石油保持了单日涨幅，因为更广泛的市场重拾风险基调，使包括原油在内的大宗商品受益，同时一场风暴威胁着墨西哥湾的一些供应。【原文：Oil held a one-day gain as a risk-on tone returned to wider markets, benefiting commodities including crude, while a storm menaced some supplies in the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 马来西亚央行行长预计 2024 年将维持利率不变，增长率为 5
item.description: 马来西亚中央银行（Bank Negara Malaysia）副行长表示，即使全球央行转向宽松政策，马来西亚的经济韧性和受控的物价压力也应允许其在今年下半年保持利率不变。【原文：Malaysia’s resilient economy and contained price pressures should allow it to keep interest rates unchanged for the rest of the year, even as global central banks pivot toward easing, according to Bank Negara Malaysia’s deputy governor.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长称反对党阻碍中央银行改革
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，他对自由党-国家党反对派拒绝接受他就储备银行改革提出的妥协方案感到失望，但并不感到惊讶，他可能会转向少数党寻求协议。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said he was disappointed but not surprised that the Liberal-National opposition had rejected his compromise offer on Reserve Bank reforms and he may turn to minority parties in search of a deal.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随华尔街复苏：市场综述
item.description: 在本周晚些时候将公布的通胀数据可能为美联储降息规模提供线索之前，亚洲股市将追随华尔街的反弹走势，这主要是受到再次出现的逢低买盘的推动。【原文：Asian stocks were set to track a rebound on Wall Street fueled by renewed dip-buying ahead of inflation data due later this week that may give clues on the size of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 全球顶级石油交易商的繁荣年代因波动性减弱而逝去
item.description: 随着过去几年发生的震撼性市场事件的影响开始减弱，世界顶级大宗商品贸易商正在努力应对更加严峻的石油贸易环境。【原文：The world’s top commodity merchants are grappling with a tougher environment for trading oil as seismic market events of the past few years start to lose their impact.】

item.title: IPhone 的相机控制按钮是最引人注目的变化
item.description: 从外观上看，苹果公司的最新款 iPhone 与去年的机型并无明显区别，只是在右下方多了一个小按钮。【原文：From the outside, Apple Inc.’s latest iPhones aren’t strikingly different than last year’s models — other than a small button nestled into the lower right side.】

item.title: 零食制造商希勒食品公司发行 9.625% 债券为股息融资
item.description: 零食生产商希勒食品公司（Shearer's Foods）的母公司对 4.5 亿美元债券的定价比最初预期的要宽松，不过在美联储预期降息之前，投资者仍能获得 9.625% 的丰厚收益。【原文：The parent of snack producer Shearer’s Foods priced a $450 million bond tighter than initially expected, though investors are still getting a juicy yield at 9.625% ahead of anticipated Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 监管机构的最新计划将美国最大银行的资本金增幅削减一半
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在监管机构同意对拟议的一揽子规则进行全面修改后，美国最大的银行将面临资本要求增加 9% 的问题，这是对原计划的大幅削减。【原文：The biggest US banks would face a 9% increase in capital requirements — a dramatic retreat from the original plan — after regulators agreed to sweeping changes to a proposed package of rules, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: JBS 称消费者不愿为可持续食品买单
item.description: 全球最大肉类公司的高层管理人员表示，消费者不愿意为按照更高的环境标准生产的食品支付溢价，这给生产商带来了挑战。【原文：Consumers are unwilling to pay a premium for food that is produced under higher environmental standards, posing a challenge for producers, according to the top executive at the world’s largest meat company.】

item.title: 私募基金与保险业争夺 15 万亿美元退休奖金
item.description:
一场小众的监管冲突可能会塑造年金和养老金的未来，影响数百万储蓄者的 "巢蛋"。【原文：

A niche regulatory clash could shape the future of annuities and pensions, affecting the nest-eggs of millions of savers.

】

item.title: 摩根大通认为尽管美联储削减货币市场基金资产，但货币市场基金资产仍在增长
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A record pile of cash sitting in money-market funds is set to get even bigger by the end of the year even as the Federal Reserve starts to slash interest rates, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 甲骨文因云业务扩张利润超预期后上涨
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）在公布好于预期的季度利润后，在盘后交易中跳涨，表明人工智能需求继续帮助其云计算业务提高盈利。【原文：Oracle Corp. jumped in extended trading after reporting better-than-expected quarterly profit, signaling that artificial intelligence demand continues to help its cloud computing business boost earnings.】

item.title: Hostmore 下跌 91%，TGI Friday 交易取消，可能退市
item.description: 连锁餐厅 TGI Friday's Inc. 最大的特许经营商对该公司的潜在收购已告吹，英国酒店管理公司 Hostmore Plc 的股价暴跌 91%，创下历史新高，该公司预计将被除名。【原文：A potential takeover of restaurant chain TGI Friday’s Inc. by its largest franchisee has fallen apart, and shares of UK hospitality firm Hostmore Plc shares plunged a record 91% as the firm expects to be delisted.】

item.title: 美国联邦调查局称，去年加密货币欺诈增长了 45%，达到 56 亿美元
item.description: 据美国联邦调查局（US Federal Bureau of Investigations —）估计，去年消费者因与加密货币相关的欺诈行为损失超过 56 亿美元，比 2022 年猛增 45%。【原文：Consumers lost more than $5.6 billion last year through cryptocurrency-related fraud, according to an estimate from the US Federal Bureau of Investigations — a 45% jump from 2022.】

item.title: Kinaxis 大股东拒绝出售软件公司的要求
item.description: 软件供应商 Kinaxis Inc. 的最大股东之一表示，现在出售公司将是一个错误— 拒绝了一家纽约投资公司向董事会施压以寻求买家的努力。【原文：One of the largest shareholders of software provider Kinaxis Inc. said it would be a mistake to sell the company now — rejecting an effort by a New York-based investment firm to pressure the board into seeking a buyer.】

item.title: 以下是苹果公司 iPhone 和产品发布会的主要内容
item.description: 苹果公司发布了新款 iPhone 和 iPhone Pro，改进了内部组件和相机功能，设计与上一代产品基本保持一致。此外，苹果公司还宣传了其新的苹果智能（Apple Intelligence）功能以及焕然一新的 AirPods 和 Watch。以下是主要内容：【原文：Apple Inc. announced new iPhone and iPhone Pro models that offered improved internal components and camera functions, with a design that was largely unchanged from the previous generation. It also touted its new Apple Intelligence features and refreshed AirPods and Watch. Here are the key takeaways:】

item.title: 前麦格理银行家为不良资产基金融资 14 亿美元
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd. ）前银行家本-巴西（Ben Brazil）为其公司的第二支基金筹集了 14 亿美元，该基金的目标是全球不良资产。【原文：Former Macquarie Group Ltd. banker Ben Brazil raised $1.4 billion for his firm’s second fund targeting distressed assets globally.】

item.title: 巴西天气干燥导致作物播种推迟，大豆期货上涨
item.description: 大豆期货上涨，因为天气预报显示巴西降雨稀少，由此造成的干旱推迟了新大豆作物播种季节的开始。【原文：Soybean futures rose as weather forecasts show little rain in Brazil and resulting dryness pushes back the start of planting season for a new soy crop.】

item.title: 拥有总统校友的常春藤大学准备发行 5400 万美元债券
item.description: 菲利普斯学院安多弗分校（Phillips Academy Andover）是一所顶尖的预科学校，校友中有两位前美国总统，该校正在利用市政债券市场偿还现有债务。【原文：Phillips Academy Andover, a top prep school that counts two former US presidents among its alumni, is tapping the municipal bond market to pay off existing debt.】

item.title: 另类资产管理公司巴尔贝克收购 40 亿欧元葡萄牙变质贷款
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，另类资产管理公司巴尔贝克资本管理公司（Balbec Capital Management）已从总部位于卢森堡的 LX Partners 购买了一个价值超过 40 亿欧元（44 亿美元）的葡萄牙贷款组合。【原文：Alternative asset manager Balbec Capital Management has bought a portfolio worth over €4 billion ($4.4 billion) of soured Portuguese loans from Luxembourg-based LX Partners, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 苹果发布 iPhone 16，大肆宣传人工智能功能
item.description: 苹果公司推出了其旗舰产品 iPhone 16 的最新版本，首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）表示，该产品旨在 "从根本上 "利用人工智能。【原文：Apple Inc. introduced the latest version of its flagship product, the iPhone 16, with Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook saying it was designed to take advantage of artificial intelligence from the “ground up.”】

item.title: 作为 Milei 政策的一部分，阿根廷人争相存入现金储蓄
item.description: 阿根廷人正在把床垫下的美元存款取出来存入银行，这是对哈维尔-米莱伊总统及其税收大赦计划投下的信任票。【原文：Argentines are taking their dollar savings out from under the mattress and depositing them into banks in a vote of confidence for President Javier Milei as well as his tax amnesty program.】

item.title: 取得初步成功后，新西兰将扩大减肥药物试验范围
item.description: Zealand Pharma A/S 公司在一项早期试验中取得积极成果后，计划对一种潜在的肥胖症新药进行更广泛的研究，以与诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S ）和礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Zealand Pharma A/S plans to push ahead with a broader study of a potential new obesity drug to rival treatments from Novo Nordisk A/S and Eli Lilly & Co. after it showed positive results in an early-stage trial.】

item.title: 勒梅尔称法国仍有可能实现 2024 年赤字目标
item.description: 法国看守财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）表示，如果下届政府迅速采取措施，法国仍有可能实现今年和2027年的赤字削减目标。【原文：French caretaker Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said it’s still possible for the country to meet its deficit-reduction targets for this year and 2027 if the next government quickly takes measures.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利转而看衰新兴债务并兜售套期保值工具
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）对新兴市场主权信贷采取谨慎态度，认为美联储降息不太可能刺激债券基金的资金流入。【原文：Morgan Stanley has moved to a cautious approach on emerging-market sovereign credit, arguing the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut is unlikely to spur meaningful inflows at bond funds.】

item.title: 乌克兰卢克石油公司停产后，摩尔公司与俄罗斯达成原油供应协议
item.description: 匈牙利能源公司 Mol Nyrt.表示，该公司已达成一项协议，将确保通过一条穿越乌克兰的输油管道继续供应俄罗斯原油。【原文：Mol Nyrt., the Hungarian energy company, said it reached a deal that will ensure the continued supply of Russian crude oil via a pipeline running through Ukraine.】

item.title: 阿斯彭 7.37 亿美元天然气管道股权债券交易被推迟
item.description: 为土著团体购买 TC 能源公司天然气管道系统股份提供资金的 10 亿加元（7.37 亿美元）债券交易不会按计划在周一完成。【原文：A C$1 billion ($737 million) bond deal to finance an Indigenous group’s purchase of a stake in a TC Energy Corp. natural gas pipeline system won’t close as planned on Monday.】
